form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION, 230

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/26/2023 OPTIONAL FORM 230 (English Chinese) (Rev. 6/82) DEPARTMENT OF STATE DEPT. OF STATE APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION A is INSTRUCTIONS: This form must be filled out in DUPLICATE by typewriter, or if by hand in legible block letters. ALL questions must be answered, if applicable. Questions which are not applicable should be so marked. If there is insufficient room on the form, answer on separate sheets, in duplicate using the same numbers as appear on the form. Attach the sheets to the forms. DO NOT SIGN this form until instructed to do so by the consular officer. The fee for filing this application for an immigrant visa is $25.00. The fee should be paid in United States dollars or local currency equivalent or by bank draft, when you appear before the consular officer. WARNING: Any false statement or concealment of a material fact may result in your permanent exclusion from the United States. Even though you should be admitted to the United States, a fraudulent entry could be grounds for your prosecution and/or deportation. 1. Family name () First name and middle name () ZHANG Wen Ying 2. Other names used or by which known (If married woman, give maiden name) 3. Full name in native alphabet (If Roman letters not used) 3E Z 22 4. Date of birth Chinese # (Year) * (Month) A (Day) A Western PH (Day) B (Month) A calendar iii calendar 07 Oct. 1914Year) # 5. Age (*** 6. Place of birth (Give in Chinese and English) Press WH 77 (Country) China (Province) # ShangGounty) (Commune) (Village) #: 7. Nationality DE 8. Sex 9. Marital status Male Female Single (never married) Married Widowed Divorced Separated 9 OFF ** China Including my present marriage, I have been married ONE times. 10. Occupation 11. Present address Retired Shanghai, China 12 Name, address, date and place of birth of wife/husband (give maiden name of wife) rett. (PAN Cheng Mu, Husband, Add: See #11, DOB: 6/14/1912, POB: Shanghai, China ) Date and place of marriage Oct. 1935 at Shanghai, China 13. Name, addresses, dates and places of birth of all children. . 1/ PAN Jing, Add: See #15, DOB: 6/3/1935, POB: Shanghai, China 2/PAN Ning, Add: See #11, DOB: 4/4/1945, POB: Ditto 3/PAN Man Sin, Add: Macau, DOB: 11/28/1947, POB: Ditto 14. Person named in 12 and 13 who will accompany or follow me to the 15. Final address in the United States United States. 737 Folsom St., #624, With PAN Cheng Mu San Francisco, CA. 94107 16. Person you intend to join (Give name, address and relationship, if any) 17. Name and address of sponsoring person or organization (If different from 16) PAN Jing, Add: Please See #15, My Daughter Same As the Items #15 & #16 18. Personal description 19. Marks of identification (a) Color of hair (c) Height 1.65m None Black feet R inches at (b) Color of eyes (d) Complexion ( 20. Purpose in going to the United States Black Yellow Immigration 21. Length of intended stay (If permanently, so state) 22. Intended port of entry 23. Do you have a ticket to final destination? Permanently Not Yet 24. Personal Financial resources (a) Cash (c) Real estate (value) (b) Bank deposits. (d) Other (describe) A.O.S. THIS FORM MAY BE OBTAINED GRATIS AT CONSULAR OFFICES OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA .
